User - Class in fr.groupe40.projet.client
This class consists to define a user into the game, there are 3 types of 'typical' users : AI, neutral, and human
There's also few special user type, like pirate's one, or the sun's ruler.
User() - Constructor for class fr.groupe40.projet.client.User
